actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to continue the authority of the Joint Federal-State Land Use Planning Commission for Alaska until June 30, 1979.

summary.text: Extends the authority of the Joint Federal-State Land Use Planning Commission, established under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, for Alaska, until June 30, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to continue the authority of the Joint Federal-State Land Use Planning Commission for Alaska until June 30, 1979.
